message.content:
cs.DS, cs.CG, cs.IT, cs.GT, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with a problem in computational geometry (coloring points in an interval or a square) and analyzes its discrepancy, which is a concept from discrete mathematics. Therefore, cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.CG (Computational Geometry) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also uses information theory and game theory concepts, which suggest cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.GT (Game Theory) as possible sub-categories. Finally, the paper presents applications to envy minimization, which falls under cs.LG (Machine Learning).
